gui.controller

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.controller.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    7-4-15 A client that is connected to this client.
    Author:
    Tistan de Boer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Date date
      The last time a client has been seen.
      private int id
      The ID of a client.
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of a client.
      private java.lang.Boolean read
      Determines whether all messages of the client have been read.
      private java.lang.String route
      The route by which the client is routed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Client(int id, java.lang.String name, java.util.Date date, java.lang.Boolean read)
      Construct a client, based on a id, name, last seen date and whether the messages of this client have been read.
